title: Modern display font
content:
Hi!

I am new to this forum. Ive tried my own database and web resourches without luck. Maybe the expertise is here?

I love this kind of sans serif with a funny serif on the upper Case M.

Has anybody seen this font before?

I believe this is designed in this side of the millenium...

Font: 

 Base4 by Koen Hachmang 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174232/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [display.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174232/http:/typophile.com/files/display.gif) | 3.53 KB |
author: Furious Stefan

comments.content: **[Base4](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174232/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Base4%20-%20Regular&fid=52a57f1329fecea437d1748e7e48331a&fsize=60&text=HJARTDAL%20KOMMUNE&wrap=2)** by Koen Hachmang (Free for personal use), at the end of previous millennium: 1999 :)

Thank you, fvilanakis!

Then this is the "place" to be.
